content: if you have any questions or issues with the pattern please contact me on instagram or through email this pattern was created by neatly stitched you may sell toys made with this pattern but credit or tag @neatlystitched in the pictures you may not replicate and sell this pattern @neatlystitched neatlystitched business@gmail com please note that this is a free pattern however if you liked it consider supporting me on buymeacoffee i would greatly appreciate it buymeacoffee com/neatlystitched 6
